txt.en: After escaping the Citadel of winds, Azagath Sea-shadow, Belondor, and Nakási Wave-reaper entered the Mâkhda Khorbo. You pursued them into the temple of ash and blood and now scour the depths for the trio.
Belondor defends Azagath Sea-shadow's escape into the Mâkhda Khorbo. He and his crew will not yield and bar the way. There is no choice but to fight.
Belondor surrenders and admits there is no way to access the stairwell beyond the gateway. You must return to the dockyard and face what lies there.
Defeat Umshûra the Glutton within the Mâkhda Khorbo
Defeat Umshûra the Glutton within the Mâkhda Khorbo

After a battle at the Tower of Winds that crippled their ship, Azagath, Belondor, and Nakási, Reaper of the Waves flee to the cavernous underground beneath Mâkhda Khorbo. The subterranean harbour served as an illicit smuggler's den for the Temple of the All-seeing Eye, and the evil wrought by its inhabitant remains in the stone.
The Depths of Mâkhda Khorbo -- Tier 2
Defeat the denizen of the deep in the dockyard of Mâkhda Khorbo
Defeat Azagath's Sea-shade and his crew
